Title: 42421 - # Android Devices to Get You Through the Summer
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 Android devices to get someone through the summer. You can talk about phones, wearables, tablets, and even accessories to go along with your favorite Android devices. You can link to your target URL by mentioning staying up to date on the latest Android news, via the Android Headlines site. Your target audience is interested in information about technology.

Title: 42422 - Which Android Smartphone Fits You Best?
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 ways someone can decide which Android phone fits them best. You can talk about different features, screen size, capabilities, etc. Your target audience is interested in information about Android devices, so write with this audience in mind. You can link to your target URL in a section that mentions checking out the Android Headlines site for news and information about Android devices.
